label: What is your company's estimated valuation brackets? (Insert estimated bracket - lower + upper bounds in USD)
Cap table - Upload PDF or excel file (no csv)
validation: z.string().min(1, "Cap table is required").refine((val) => val.endsWith(".pdf") || val.endsWith(".xlsx") || val.endsWith(".xls"), "File must be PDF or Excel format")

label: What is your expected revenue growth one year after launching?
Upload P&L Statement (PDF or excel file, no csv)
validation: z.string().min(1, "P&L statement is required").refine((val) => val.endsWith(".pdf") || val.endsWith(".xlsx") || val.endsWith(".xls"), "File must be PDF or Excel format")

label: How many years do you expect are needed to break-even?
What is your projected net result (profit or loss) one year after launching?
options: [{"id":"loss_over_50","value":"Loss greater than 50% of revenue"},{"id":"loss_50_to_0","value":"Loss between 50% and 0%"},{"id":"break_even_or_profit","value":"Break-even or profit"}]

label: What is your projected OpEx ratio one year after launch?
options: [{"id":"over_100","value":"> 100% of revenue spent on OpEx"},{"id":"70_to_100","value":"70-100% of revenue spent on OpEx"},{"id":"under_70","value":"< 70% of revenue spent on OpEx"}]

label: Upload Balance Sheet statement (PDF or excel file, no csv)
validation: z.string().min(1, "Balance sheet is required").refine((val) => val.endsWith(".pdf") || val.endsWith(".xlsx") || val.endsWith(".xls"), "File must be PDF or Excel format")

label: What is your current monthly cash burn rate? (Time-Based)
options: [{"id":"under_6_months","value":"<6 months of runway"},{"id":"6_to_12_months","value":"6-12 months of runway"},{"id":"over_12_months","value":">12 months of runway"}]

label: What is your projected liquidity ratio 1 year after launching?
What is your projected quick liquidity ratio 1 year after launching?
What is your projected cash runway time after launching?
Did the company previously opt for debt or equity financing?
options: [{"id":"none","value":"No"},{"id":"debt","value":"Opted for debt financing"},{"id":"both","value":"Used both debt and equity"},{"id":"equity","value":"Opted for equity financing"}]

label: Upload Annual Audit report (PDF Only - ORIGINAL COPY)
validation: z.string().min(1, "Audit report is required").refine((val) => val.endsWith(".pdf"), "File must be PDF format")
